description: A ninja of the Shuumatsuban in Inazuma, Sayu is an Anemo claymore user who excels at healing, Swirl reactions, and fast movement.
info: Sayu is a 4★ Anemo healer/support who excels at healing, Swirl reactions, and fast movement. Build her for Elemental Mastery, ATK%, and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Shuumatsuban Ninja Blade
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes with her claymore.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes with her claymore.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
skills.desc: Sayu curls up into a rolling Fuufuu Windwheel, dealing Anemo DMG to enemies in her path. Hold: Rolls continuously, increasing resistance to interruption and speed.
skills.details_html:
Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
Sayu curls up into a rolling Fuufuu Windwheel, dealing Anemo DMG to enemies in her path. Hold: Rolls continuously, increasing resistance to interruption and speed. At the end, unleashes a Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.

skills.name: Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
skills.desc: Sayu summons a Muji-Muji Daruma that heals allies and deals Anemo DMG to enemies. Healing and DMG scale with Sayu's ATK and Elemental Mastery.
skills.details_html:
Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
Summons a Muji-Muji Daruma that heals allies and deals Anemo DMG to enemies. Healing and DMG scale with Sayu's ATK and Elemental Mastery.

passive_talents.name: Someone More Capable
passive_talents.desc: When Sayu triggers a Swirl reaction, she heals all nearby allies for 300 HP. Can occur once every 2s.

passive_talents.name: No Work Today!
passive_talents.desc: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry also heals characters with less than 70% HP for an additional 20% of Sayu's ATK.

passive_talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Silencer's Secret
passive_talents.desc: When Sayu is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when approaching them.

constellations.name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
constellations.desc: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry also attacks nearby enemies when healing is not needed.

constellations.name: Egress Prep
constellations.desc: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash gains the following effects: DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick increases by 3.3% for each point of Elemental Mastery Sayu has. Max 198% increase.

constellations.name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Skiving: New and Improved
constellations.desc: Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction. Can occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: Speed Comes First
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sleep O'Clock
constellations.desc: The Muji-Muji Daruma ignores HP limits and can heal all characters nearby regardless of their HP.
